sentences.en: an indefatigable defender of human rights
sentences.cn: 不屈不挠的人权捍卫者

sentences.en: Camel - Docility, patience and indefatigable perseverance.
sentences.cn: 骆驼 - 驯顺 、 耐心,和任劳任怨的坚持.

sentences.en: Camel - Docility, patience and indefatigable perseverance.
sentences.cn: 骆驼 - 驯顺 、 耐心,和任劳任怨的坚持.

sentences.en: Encouraged by this discovery, Edmond determined to assist the indefatigable laborer.
sentences.cn: 在这个发现的鼓舞之下, 爱德蒙决心要帮助那个不屈不挠的劳动者.

sentences.en: He was indefatigable in his efforts to secure funding for new projects.
sentences.cn: 他不知疲倦地努力为新项目寻求资金。

sentences.en: He was indefatigable in his lectures on the aesthetics of love.
sentences.cn: 在讲授关于爱情的美学时,他是不知疲倦的.

sentences.en: His indefatigable spirit helped him to cope with his illness.
sentences.cn: 他不屈不挠的精神帮助他对抗病魔。

sentences.en: Indeed, their dedication and indefatigable spirit clearly demonstrated the highest level of of the teaching profession.
sentences.cn: 是的, 他们的献身与诲人不倦的精神,清楚的体现了为人师表的最高理想.

sentences.en: Outdoors he's an indefatigable persevering dog, that is afraid of no and takes on any ram.
sentences.cn: 在户外,它是孜孜不倦、至不屈的狗, 任何事物都不会令边境牧羊犬退怯,它们勇于追捕任何一只发狂的公羊.

sentences.en: Relentless and indefatigable in pursuit or as if in pursuit.
sentences.cn: 不懈的、不知疲倦的在追求或者好像是在追求.

sentences.en: The indefatigable Walters was in his element.
sentences.cn: 精力充沛的沃尔特斯真是得其所哉.

sentences.en: The President propped up high in his chair, carved beef for all with masterly, indefatigable skill.
sentences.cn: 总统高高地坐在椅子上, 用非常高明的技巧, 毫不疲倦地给大家切牛肉.

sentences.en: The success of Ao Di A 6 also is these the achievement of year of indefatigable effort.
sentences.cn: 奥迪A6的成功也是这些年不懈努力的成果.

sentences.en: The very reputation of being strong - willed, plucky , and indefatigable is of priceless value.
sentences.cn: 意志坚强 、 胆量过人和不屈不挠的名声, 乃是一种无价之宝.

sentences.en: Through indefatigable effort, france had gained delectable success in informatization respect.
sentences.cn: 经过不懈努力, 法国已经在信息化方面取得了可喜成就.

words.tran_cn: 不知疲倦的；不屈不挠的；有耐性的

trans.tran_cn: 不倦的，不屈不挠的，不眠不休，不懈
trans.tran_en: You use indefatigable to describe someone who never gets tired of doing something
